intro: Lantana maxima f. alba, commonly known as white lantana, is a flowering plant belonging to the Verbenaceae family. It is characterized by its showy, clustered white flowers that bloom in summer. The plant is native to tropical and subtropical regions of the Americas. It typically grows as an upright shrub with opposite, ovate leaves. Lantana maxima f. alba is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and landscapes.
